sentence: 1. I bought a new lock for my bedroom door wound up getting half off when it didnt work.
explanation: A lock is a device for securing something.
first_new_sentence: The lock on my front door is broken and needs to be replaced.
second_new_sentence: The lock of the door was so rusty that it could not be opened easily.

sentence: 2. Why couldnt jfk be a boxer? he couldnt take shots to the head.
explanation: A shot is a hit or strike.
first_new_sentence: He took a shot at the target and hit the bullseye.
second_new_sentence: The shot was heard across the entire hall during the event.

sentence: 3. Why did the alarm go off at the mansion? because the owner entered the correct code.
explanation: A code is a system of symbols used to represent information.
first_new_sentence: The secret code was revealed during the meeting.
second_new_sentence: The genetic code determines the traits of living organisms.

sentence: 4. Why was six afraid of seven? because seven raped snow white.
explanation: Seven is the number following six.
first_new_sentence: There are seven colors in a rainbow.

sentence: 5. A dog was giving birth on the side of the road... she was cited with littering.
explanation: Littering is the act of throwing away trash in public places.
first_new_sentence: The littering in the park drew complaints from residents.
second_new_sentence: Littering is illegal and can result in fines.
